opis: KUĆA, PRODAJA, CRIKVENICA, 360 m2, 9-sobna Prodaje se kuća s pogledom na more izgrađena 1890. godine u Crikvenici. Kuća se sastoji od tri etaže : PRIZEMLJE : dnevni boravak, kuhinja i blagovaonica, hodnik, ostava i wc. KAT : tri spavaće sobe, hodnik, garderoba, dvije kupaonice i wc. POTKROVLJE : dnevni boravak sa blagovaonicom, kuhinja, dvije spavaće sobe, kupaonica i dva wc-a. Kuća sadrži i dva garažna parkirna mjesta i dvorište. Površina zemljišta je 573 m2. Zadnja adaptacija kuće bila je 2002. godine. Kuća se nalazi na odličnoj lokaciji u Crikvenici s pogledom na more. S obzirom na mirnu lokaciju i predivan pogled na more, kuća je idealna kao investicija. Vlasništvo uredno. HOUSE FOR SALE, CRIKVENICA, 360 m², 9-ROOM A house with a sea view, built in 1890, is for sale in Crikvenica. The house consists of three floors: GROUND FLOOR: Living room, kitchen and dining area, hallway, storage room, and toilet. FIRST FLOOR: Three bedrooms, hallway, wardrobe, two bathrooms, and toilet. ATTIC: Living room with dining area, kitchen, two bedrooms, a bathroom, and two toilets. The property also includes two garage parking spaces and a yard. The land area is 573 m². The last renovation of the house was in 2002. The house is in an excellent location in Crikvenica with a sea view. Considering the peaceful location and the stunning sea view, the house is ideal as an investment. Ownership is clear.
